topics.title: Welcome to Task Beacon
topics.subtitle: Your smart shopping and task companion
topics.content: Task Beacon helps you organize shopping lists and to-do items with location-based reminders. Get notified when you're near stores or task locations.
tips: Tap the + button to add your first item
Switch between Shopping and To-Do tabs
Enable location permissions for smart reminders

topics.title: Required Permissions
topics.subtitle: What we need and why it's critical
topics.content: TaskBeacon needs specific permissions to provide location-based reminders and smart notifications. Here's what each permission does and why it's essential:

permissions.name: Location Access
permissions.description: Provides store-based shopping reminders and location-based task notifications
details: First, you'll be asked for 'While Using App' permission
Later, you'll be prompted to change to 'Always Allow'
This two-step process is required by iOS for background location monitoring
Without 'Always Allow', you won't receive notifications when the app is in the background
Location data is only used for geofencing and is never shared or stored permanently
permissions.whyCritical: Background location monitoring is essential for location-based reminders to work when the app isn't active.

permissions.name: Notifications
permissions.description: Sends reminders when you're near stores or task locations
details: Enables push notifications for location-based reminders
Sends notifications when you enter geofence areas around stores or task locations
Also handles due date reminders for to-do items
You can customize notification sounds and timing in Settings
permissions.whyCritical: Without notifications, you won't be alerted when you're near locations where you have items to buy or tasks to complete.

permissions.name: Camera
permissions.description: Scans barcodes to quickly add products to your shopping list
details: Used only for barcode scanning feature
Automatically fills in product information when scanning
Camera access is only active when the scanner is open
You can still add items manually without camera permission
permissions.whyCritical: Camera permission is optional but highly recommended for the fastest way to add products to your shopping list.

permissions.name: Ad Personalization
permissions.description: Enables personalized ads and rewards system
details: Allows personalized ads for better user experience
Enables the rewards system for earning extra items
You can opt out of personalization in Settings
Non-personalized ads will still be shown if you opt out
permissions.whyCritical: Ad personalization helps provide a better experience and enables the rewards system for free users.

permissionSteps.title: Initial Setup
permissionSteps.description: When you first use location features, iOS will ask for 'While Using App' permission

permissionSteps.title: Background Access
permissionSteps.description: After using location features, you'll be prompted to change to 'Always Allow' for background monitoring

permissionSteps.title: Notification Setup
permissionSteps.description: Enable notifications to receive location-based reminders and due date alerts

permissionSteps.title: Optional Features
permissionSteps.description: Grant camera permission for barcode scanning and ad personalization for rewards

tips: If you accidentally deny 'Always Allow', go to Settings > Privacy & Security > Location Services > TaskBeacon to change it
You can manage all permissions in Settings > Privacy & Security
Location data is only used for geofencing and is never shared with third parties
Notifications can be customized or disabled in Settings > Notifications > TaskBeacon
